projects.title: Tetris
projects.alt: thumbnail of React tetris game project
summary: A personal rendition of the classic tetris game originally developed by Alexey Pajitnov.
features: 10x20 Gameboard Grid
Traditional tetris pieces (tetrominoes)
Start button to begin the game
Reset button to start the game over
Tetromino travels down the grid, one block at a time
Player presses up arrow or 'X' key to rotate tetromino clockwise
Player presses ctrl (option) or 'Z' key to rotate tetromino counter-clockwise
Player presses down arrow to move tetromino down faster (soft drop)
Player Presses left and right arrow keys to move tetromino accordingly
responsibilities: Created Trello board to manage and organize project requirements

projects.title: Sweet Beats
projects.alt: thumbnail of sweet beats React website
summary: A playlist generator application that allows the user to create playlists based on bpm, danceability, energy, instrumentalness, and valence (musical positiveness). Developed by myself and three other developers for a Chingu cohort group project during a six week span.
features: Create new playlists based on user's existing Spotify playlists
Filter songs by bpm, danceability, energy, instrumentalness, and valence
Listen to a 30 second preview of songs in each playlist
Save new playlists to the user's Spotify account
responsibilities: Created a design mockup for the team utilizing Figma
Developed playlist settings range filters for tempo (bpm), danceability, energy, instrumentalness, and valence
Deployed application front end and backend repositories with Heroku
projects.gitHubBtnAriaLabel: Go to Sweet Beats GitHub Repo
projects.figmaBtnAriaLabel: Go to Sweet Beats Figma design mockup

projects.title: Movie Finder
summary: An IMDb alternative application created by myself and 3 other developers for a six week Chingu group project.
features: Search api integration to look for a movie
View details on a selected movie
Add movies to a watchlist
Sign In and Sign Up modals
responsibilities: Designed a mockup for the team utilizing Figma
Developed Sign In and Sign Up components

projects.title: eCalendar
summary: A frontend only React calendar application for a Chingu cohort solo project.
features: Displays calendars days of the month
Current date is distinguishable
Left and right arrows to switch months
Background image changes based on the season in which the current displayed month is part of
Displays previous monthâ€™s last dates if first day of current month does not start on a Sunday
3 demo events in the event panel portion of the project
Displays last days of previous month and/or first days of next month as buffers when needed
Sign In button that opens a Sign In Modal when clicked
Plus icon that opens an Add Event Form when clicked
responsibilities: Created Trello board to manage and organize project requirements

projects.title: Quest Overland
projects.alt: thumbnail of Quest Overland design project
summary: An unofficial home page redesign mockup for Quest Overland, a sprinter van window cover business. Discovered the prompt via 99designs.
customer: Use provided photographs on the homepage
Search bar on the header with links
creative: Hero image that showcases the great outdoors
Gray with forest green accent to pair well with the hero image
Powerful mission statement that explains what the product it and its value to the customer
Road map background to symbolize a journey (perhaps in a sprinter van)
Arrows underneath tile headers symbolize direction and redirect the eye back to the photos
Photos provide powerful and quick emotional responses

projects.title: Mqual
summary: An unofficial home page redesign mockup for Mqual. Discovered the prompt via 99designs.
customer: Technology professionals that provide a multitude of services
Highlight successes by including numerical figures
creative: Included a hero image that demonstrates they are an IT company
Discussed some of the services they offer
Used colors that complement each other
Chose a font that means business - professional and clean cut

projects.title: Peace Lovin' Granola
projects.alt: thumbnail of Peace Lovin' Granola project
projects.mockupAlt: Peace Lovin' Granola design project mockup
summary: An unofficial homepage redesign mockup for Peace Lovin' Granola. Discovered the prompt via 99designs.
customer: Showcase the product by including images provided
Convey that it is a family owned and run business
creative: Create a sense of youth with the fonts, icons, and wording
Wanted an ordering form area that was simple and to the point
Action taking buttons that stand out for the customer
Included photo of the brothers/business owners to convey family, love, and friendliness

projects.title: Sugar Pop Bakery
projects.alt: thumbnail of Sugar Pop Bakery design project
projects.mockupAlt: Sugar Pop Bakery design project mockup
summary: A design mockup created with Photoshop for a fictitious bakery business. After creating the design mockup, I utilized HTML5, CSS/Sass, and Bootstrap 4 to create a live version.
customer: I had a lot of liberties since I filled customer role
I wanted something light and airy, minimalist, and feminine
Preference towards a company name that is simple and minimalist
creative: Chose light and pastel colors to create an airy vibe
Included product images that were minimalist and artistic
I wanted a company name that was simple and minimalist
Selected fonts that fulfilled both femininity and minimalism
